actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 95-614.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #646 (347-37).
Measure laid on table House, S. 1863 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1978 for procurement of aircraft and missiles, and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 95-614) Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act - =Title I: Procurement= - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978 for the procurement of aircraft and missiles by the Navy and the Air Force. =Title II: Research, Development, Test and Evaluation= - Authorizes supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1978 for research, development, test, and evaluation by the Navy, the Air Force and the Defense agencies.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1978 for procurement of aircraft and missiles, and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces.
